result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig na focail amaċ as a béal ina néalta beaga gaileThe words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.

result.eng: She was kicking the pavement gravel in front of herself.
result.ga: Bhí sí ag ciceáil ghairbhéal an chosáin amach roimpi
result.orig: Bhí sí ag ciceáil ghairbhéal an chosáin amach roimpi
result.html: Bhí sí ag ciceáil ghairbhéal an chosáin amach roimpiShe was kicking the pavement gravel in front of herself.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ag ciceáil ġairḃéal an ċosáin amaċ roimpiShe was kicking the pavement gravel in front of herself.

result.eng: She back out of the cave on all fours.
result.ga: Chúlaigh sí amach as an bpluais ar na ceithre boinn
result.orig: Chúlaigh sí amach as an bpluais ar na ceithre boinn
result.html: Chúlaigh sí amach as an bpluais ar na ceithre boinnShe back out of the cave on all fours.
result.ponchtml: Ċúlaiġ sí amaċ as an bpluais ar na ceiṫre boinnShe back out of the cave on all fours.

result.eng: When the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.
result.ga: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlann
result.orig: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlann
result.html: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlannWhen the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃí an obráid ṫart ṫáinig an doċtúir amaċ as an obrádlannWhen the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.

result.eng: She was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ga: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.orig: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.html: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ cead aici dul amaċ as an teaċ ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.

result.eng: And if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ga: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.orig: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.html: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobhAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ponchtml: Agus dá mba ḃuama é caiṫfiḋ gur ċeann ollṁór é a ṗléascfaḋ an foirgneaṁ amaċ ar ḋá ṫaoḃAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.

result.eng: Those strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ga: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.orig: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.html: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ponchtml: Glanaḋ na ceisteanna aisteaċa seo amaċ as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.

result.eng: While there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...
result.ga: Agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i Nua-EabhracWhile there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...
result.ponchtml: Agus scamaill duḃa ag plúċaḋ amaċ as na túir i Nua-EaḃracWhile there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...

result.eng: A smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ga: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora
result.orig: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora
result.html: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteoraA smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ponchtml: Ḃris meangaḋ gáire amaċ ar aġaiḋ an ḟáilteoraA smile broke out on the receptionist's face.

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ga: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.orig: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.html: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sí go maiṫ gur iomaí iriseoir a tógaḋ amaċ as an óstán ar ċláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].

result.eng: As soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...
result.ga: Ar fáil amach do na cóilínigh go raibh talamh mhaith sa domhan nua
result.orig: Ar fáil amach do na cóilínigh go raibh talamh mhaith sa domhan nua
result.html: Ar fáil amach do na cóilínigh go raibh talamh mhaith sa domhan nuaAs soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...
result.ponchtml: Ar fáil amaċ do na cóilíniġ go raiḃ talaṁ ṁaiṫ sa doṁan nuaAs soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...

result.eng: From this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ga: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.orig: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.html: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ponchtml: As an am seo amaċ b'iad scláḃaiṫe forṁór mór na ndaoine gorma a facṫas san Eoraip agus sa doṁan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: Mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.

result.eng: Get out of my way!
result.ga: Amach as mo bhealach leat
result.orig: Amach as mo bhealach leat
result.html: Amach as mo bhealach leatGet out of my way!
result.ponchtml: Amaċ as mo ḃealaċ leatGet out of my way!

result.eng: The old woman was a damn good story-teller.
result.ga: Ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbhean
result.orig: Ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbhean
result.html: Ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbheanThe old woman was a damn good story-teller.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃreá amaċ an scéalaí an tseanḃeanThe old woman was a damn good story-teller.

result.eng: Before them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ga: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.orig: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.html: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ponchtml: Baile beag suaraċ ocraċ beadaí a ḃí amaċ rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.

result.eng: He is a thouroughly learned man.
result.ga: Tá an léann amach aige
result.orig: Tá an léann amach aige
result.html: Tá an léann amach aigeHe is a thouroughly learned man.
result.ponchtml: Tá an léann amaċ aigeHe is a thouroughly learned man.

result.eng: They decided to stay on dry land till morning.
result.ga: Rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidin
result.orig: Rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidin
result.html: Rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidinThey decided to stay on dry land till morning.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad amaċ fanaċt ar an talaṁ tirim go maidinThey decided to stay on dry land till morning.
